name: The 4th International Conference on Education and Psychology
content: 2018 International Conference on Education and Psychology (ICEAP 2018) is scheduled to be held from November 13-15, 2018 in Bangkok, Thailand. ICEAP aims to provide a communication platform for scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students not only to present their recent and latest researches but also to share their thoughts and to discuss the future development in the field of education and psychology. Papers/ abstracts in the fields of education and psychology below are welcomed. Prospective authors are invited to submit original research abstracts or full papers which were not, are not and have not been submitted/published/under consideration in other conferences and journals. Audiences are also welcomed to join the conference for research and opinions exchanging. Topic: Education & Psychology. For more sub-filed please check: http://www.iceap.org/site/page.aspx?pid=126&sid=6041&lang=en Our website: http://www.iceap.org
